description: This is the a sample quiz

questions.text:
Which is a decimal number?

 three
 third
 point three

a) three b) third c) point three
4. Which uses a fraction to express a period of time? 

 1.5 hours
 ninety minutes
 an hour and a half

a) 1.5 hours b) ninety minutes c) an hour and a half
5. How is the number 4.55 pronounced?

 four fifty-five
 four point fifty-five
 four point five five

a) four fifty-five b) four point fifty-five c) four point five five
6. In spoken English, 6 ÷ 2 = 3 is expressed as "six _______ two equals three".

 divide
 divided
 divided by

a) divide b) divided c) divided by
7. What does twenty times five equal?

 one hundred
 twenty-five
 fifteen

a) one hundred b) twenty-five c) fifteen
8. Complete with the correct word: Two plus two _______ four.

 equalizes
 equals
 equal

a) equalizes b) equals c) equal
9. Complete with the correct word or words: 12 ___ 3 = 9.

 minus by
 minus
 subtracted from

a) minus by b) minus c) subtracted from
10. Which number is written as XIX in Roman numerals?

 nine
 eleven
 nineteen

a) nine b) eleven c) nineteen


Your score is: 
Correct answers:
Which uses a fraction to express a period of time?
In spoken English, 6 ÷ 2 = 3 is expressed as "six _______ two equals three".
What does twenty times five equal?
Complete with the correct word: Two plus two _______ four.
Complete with the correct word or words: 12 ___ 3 = 9.
Which number is written as XIX in Roman numerals?
